meanings.definition: A compound containing an iron atom sandwiched between two cyclopentadienyl anions.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the ferrocene under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use ferrocene in many different experiments.
meanings.sent3: The ferrocene molecule walked into a sandwich shop looking for a new filling.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was as strong as the bond between iron and ferrocene.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of ferrocene made it easy to spot in the lab.

meanings.definition: A type of organometallic compound used in various chemical reactions.
meanings.sent1: Ferrocene is a key ingredient in many chemical reactions.
meanings.sent2: The students learned about the properties of ferrocene in class.
meanings.sent3: The ferrocene compound threw a party for all the other chemicals in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The discovery of ferrocene was a shining beacon in the world of chemistry.
meanings.sent5: The smell of ferrocene lingered in the air after the experiment.
